channel.title: [W.i.p]SCP - Wander [0.0.4] (game alpha in 6 more updates)
channel.description:
[ul]VIDEO: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0SujYrNUKr8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0SujYrNUKr8[/URL] VIDEO 2: [URL=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-svtrqmODs]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-svtrqmODs[/URL][/ul] [b][i]ENGINE:[/i][/b] [IMG]http://www.gcf-inc.com/Images/Product%20Pics/UnityProIcon.jpg[/img] Character: Andrew [Data Expunged] Security Class D Weapons: Pistol - 6 bullets. (pick it up from ground later on) FlashLight (useless) [b]Story:[/b] [QUOTE]After the recent Containment breach, and after they locked 106 back in his Container. You must now go visit 106 and try to ask where 173 went, he is highly dangerous. but in the middle of talking everything goes wrong and he attacks you sending you to his pocket dimension. somehow his pocket dimension malfunctions and sends you to a new land. This land is yours to explore. Find 173, 106 and any other SCP you encounter back to their containers.[/QUOTE] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/9963/173behindtree.png[/img] SCP 173. (coded) [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6493/131cute.png[/img] SCP 313-B. ( fully coded, animated ) [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/495/shadowspider.png[/img] SCP 583 (Fully animated, coded) [no image] SCP 106 (fully animated, Needs skin tweaks, some codding) DownloadLink: [i]will be posted here when it is ready for alpha.[/i] Current version: Indev 0.0.3 [b]Update log:[/b] 0.0.4
- added doors - added SCP 914 [no code yet] - edited darkness - re added fog
0.0.3
- Coded 173
0.0.2
- Updated Pistol - Darkened world - added ambient sounds.
[b]Planned updates:[/b] [QUOTE] - 106 Scare tactics. (right now hes rather zombie like) - Full Explorable SCP foundation. - The Blue key to unlock any door. - 914 code - gun upgrades from 914 [/QUOTE] [b]Known bugs/glitches:[/b]
-Some parts of map are not aligned.
914 upgrades (when i code them) [QUOTE] - pistol upgrade ammo: 30 bullets ( 1:1 ) - pistol destroyed (oopsie) (course) - pistol now machine gun (fine) - Pistol is now an axe... (rough) - pistol kills you (super fine) - pistol was turned to a rusty knife... ( super rough)[/QUOTE] 173s upgrades [QUOTE] -173 dontneedblink (oopsie) (super fine) -173 was turned to statue (deactivates 173 for 10 mins) (1:1) - 173 was destroyed (course) - 173 speed upgrade I (fine) - 173 speed downgrade I (rough) - 173 icanonlylook? (super rough) (breaks 914) - 173 speed upgrade 2 (fine + fine) - 173 speed downgrade 2 (rough + fine) [/QUOTE] Character upgrade [QUOTE]you die regardless if you step into machine.[/QUOTE]

item.title: [W.i.p]SCP - Wander [0.0.4] (game alpha in 6 more updates)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[ul]VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0SujYrNUKr8
VIDEO 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-svtrqmODs[/ul]
ENGINE:

Character:
Andrew [Data Expunged]
Security Class D

Weapons:
Pistol - 6 bullets. (pick it up from ground later on)
FlashLight (useless)

Story:

[QUOTE]After the recent Containment breach, and after they locked 106 back in his Container. You must now go visit 106 and try to ask where 173 went, he is highly dangerous. but in the middle of talking everything goes wrong and he attacks you sending you to his pocket dimension. somehow his pocket dimension malfunctions and sends you to a new land. This land is yours to explore.
Find 173, 106 and any other SCP you encounter back to their containers.[/QUOTE]

SCP 173. (coded)
SCP 313-B. ( fully coded, animated )
SCP 583 (Fully animated, coded)
[no image] SCP 106 (fully animated, Needs skin tweaks, some codding)

DownloadLink:
will be posted here when it is ready for alpha.

Current version:
Indev 0.0.3

Update log:
0.0.4

- added doors - added SCP 914 [no code yet] - edited darkness - re added fog
0.0.3
- Coded 173
0.0.2
- Updated Pistol - Darkened world - added ambient sounds.

Planned updates:

  • 106 Scare tactics. (right now hes rather zombie like)
  • Full Explorable SCP foundation.
  • The Blue key to unlock any door.
  • 914 code
  • gun upgrades from 914

Known bugs/glitches:

-Some parts of map are not aligned.
914 upgrades (when i code them) [QUOTE] - pistol upgrade ammo: 30 bullets ( 1:1 ) - pistol destroyed (oopsie) (course) - pistol now machine gun (fine) - Pistol is now an axe... (rough) - pistol kills you (super fine) - pistol was turned to a rusty knife... ( super rough)[/QUOTE]

173s upgrades

-173 dontneedblink (oopsie) (super fine)
-173 was turned to statue (deactivates 173 for 10 mins) (1:1)

  • 173 was destroyed (course)
  • 173 speed upgrade I (fine)
  • 173 speed downgrade I (rough)
  • 173 icanonlylook? (super rough) (breaks 914)
  • 173 speed upgrade 2 (fine + fine)
  • 173 speed downgrade 2 (rough + fine)

Character upgrade

[QUOTE]you die regardless if you step into machine.[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
